pages.text: $(li)Powered Rails are a variant of the $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/rail)Rail$(/l).$(br)$(li)This kind of Rail is used to increase or decrease the movement speed of the $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/minecart)Minecarts$(/l).

$(li)By default, Minecarts that walks on a Powered Rail will have their normal movement speed.$(br)$(li)If the Powered Rail receives a redstone signal, the Minecart than walk on that Powered Rail will increase its speed movement considerably.
